isis.stitle: ANTILOCK TRACTION CONTROL RELAY VALVE: BENDIX ATR-2 - OPERATION - SERVICE BRAKES HOLDING - TRACTOR/TRAILER COMBINATION

svcproc.title: SERVICE BRAKES HOLDING - TRACTOR/TRAILER COMBINATION

figure.caption: Figure 4. Service Brakes Holding - Tractor/Trailer Combination

svcproc.para: The air pressure being delivered to the brake chambers is also present beneath the relay piston. When the air pressure above and below the relay piston is equal, the piston moves slightly, allowing the inlet valve to return to its seat. The exhaust valve remains closed. With both the inlet and exhaust valves closed, air pressure in the brake chambers is held stable and neither increases nor decreases.
